body_html: The summary ops are magic in that the canonical summary use depends on the collection. They are ops just like all the others, but their return values are very rarely used (I guess you could depend on them, but typically you're really happy that they don't run, and what are you going to do with the serialized proto anyway except for write it to disk?). I would omit the return types in the example code, I don't think it's all that enlightening.

body: The summary ops are magic in that the canonical summary use depends on the collection. They are ops just like all the others, but their return values are very rarely used (I guess you could depend on them, but typically you're really happy that they don't run, and what are you going to do with the serialized proto anyway except for write it to disk?). I would omit the return types in the example code, I don't think it's all that enlightening.
